definition: in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: And if war comes do such men as these shoulder the musket and go into the trenches?
sentences.chinese: 但一旦戰爭來臨，這類人會肩扛步槍進入戰壕嗎？

sentences.english: Once Synechococcus spp. forms bloom, its influence will be far-reaching to whole ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 一旦形成赤潮，對整個生態系統的影響將非常深遠。

sentences.english: Once your head hits the pillow you will probably sleep very fast.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你的腦袋黏上枕頭，你將會很快入睡。

sentences.english: Once fastening bolts, each bolt to ensure that the force evenly.
sentences.chinese: 一旦開始緊固螺栓，要確保各個螺栓均勻受力。

sentences.english: But the weak states remain vulnerable to a loss of confidence by depositors.
sentences.chinese: 一旦儲戶信心喪失，弱國仍將面臨巨大風險。

sentences.english: But once he learns, he'll never forget.
sentences.chinese: 但一旦他學會，就永遠忘不掉了。

sentences.english: Once the bootloader is loaded, press power to install.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引導加載，按權力來安裝。

sentences.english: When you know where you re headed, you can choose any route to get there.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你知道了目標，路徑就可以任你挑選了。

sentences.english: Once the Iso image has been created it can be burned to DVD.
sentences.chinese: 一旦ISO鏡像創建好，它就可以燒錄成DVD了。

sentences.english: Once in the water, it reacts to form carbonic acid.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳一旦進入水中，就會發生反應形成碳酸。

sentences.english: Once we eliminated the idea that we were converting to Six Sigma, there was much more acceptance of it.
sentences.chinese: 一旦屏棄採用六西格瑪策略，我們更容易接受它。

sentences.english: You couldn't shuffle or adjust your position once you put your hands up.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你舉了手，你就不能再滑步防守和調整位置。

sentences.english: Once the breakthrough is still to be committed smiles and life.
sentences.chinese: 一旦突圍仍是矢志不移的笑面人生。

sentences.english: I will offer myself to the state as emergency arise.
sentences.chinese: 一旦發生緊急情況，我一定會爲祖國獻身的。

sentences.english: And I hear it gets even more complicated once they’re smoked.
sentences.chinese: 而我聽說一旦被燻烤之後情況就更復雜。

sentences.english: Once school-related fears of children was diagnosed, the treatment that given early would achieve better effects.
sentences.chinese: 一旦確診兒童學校恐怖症，早期予以治療則療效較好。

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
usually/in many cases/more often than not
